title: I can t access my GFunds account What do I do
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Articles in this section

- [My Sell Order has not been reflected in my GFunds account. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/41040351575833-My-Sell-Order-has-not-been-reflected-in-my-GFunds-account-What-do-I-do)
- [I can’t buy or sell funds in GFunds. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/35735707460505-I-can-t-buy-or-sell-funds-in-GFunds-What-do-I-do)
- [I can’t open a GFunds account. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30845311649561-I-can-t-open-a-GFunds-account-What-do-I-do)
- [I can’t access my GFunds account. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30845136114201-I-can-t-access-my-GFunds-account-What-do-I-do)
- [Why am I not qualified for GFunds?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30845376740249-Why-am-I-not-qualified-for-GFunds)
- [My Buy Order has not been reflected in my GFunds account. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30845990526105-My-Buy-Order-has-not-been-reflected-in-my-GFunds-account-What-do-I-do)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

If you can’t access your GFunds account, it may be due to:

**Technical Issues:** If you encounter a technical error during the application process, such as issues with entering the OTP (One-Time Password), ensure that your account details are correct and up-to-date.

**System Maintenance or Errors:** If you see a "Something went wrong" or "System Maintenance" error, it may be due to system downtime. To learn how to troubleshoot common issues with the GCash app, [click here.](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/38910877046937-How-to-troubleshoot-GCash-app-issues)

If you’re still unable to access your GFunds account, [click here to ask for help](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=360000706713&ind=normal&tf_360023219534=ginvest__i_am_unable_to_place_a_sell_order_on_ginvest.) and a customer representative will be in touch in **1-2 business days**.

### **Need more Help?**

For other inquiries or concerns, check out the following articles:

- [I can’t buy or sell in GFunds. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/35735707460505)
- [How do I track my pending Buy and Sell orders in GFunds?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900004505786)
